channel.title: Needing help [REWARDING]
channel.description:
I have few stuff to fix on my server - Monsters allways hit melee - Woodcutting/Mining give normal rs xp. - Jad waves don't appear after I relog - Add zammy to the Godwars teleport (Only: Arma/Bandos/Sara there) - Players get invisible and I gotta relog to see em * There are some other but those are my main fixes, please help me doing this, I really need to get my server 24/7 but I aint putting it on when it still has bugs :(
COME ON HELP ME :(
